title: Authorizes granting of tax credit for home energy conservation improvement
summary: Authorizes granting of tax credit for home energy conservation improvement.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2573

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 26, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KRUGER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Cities

       AN ACT to amend the general city law, in relation to providing  for  the
         granting  of  a  deduction on city personal income tax for home energy
         conservation expenses

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  third  undesignated paragraph of section 25-a of the
    2  general city law is amended by adding a new subparagraph (d) to read  as
    3  follows:
    4    (D)  SUCH LOCAL LAW MAY BE FURTHER AMENDED TO PROVIDE THAT AN INDIVID-
    5  UAL WHO IS OWNER OCCUPANT OF A ONE, TWO,  THREE  OR  FOUR  FAMILY  HOUSE
    6  SHALL BE ENTITLED TO SUBTRACT FROM HIS FEDERAL ADJUSTED GROSS INCOME THE
    7  EXPENSES  OF  PROVIDING  ENERGY  CONSERVATION  IMPROVEMENTS FOR HIS HOME
    8  INCLUDING WEATHER STRIPPING, STORM WINDOWS AND DOORS,  MODERNIZATION  OF
    9  HEATING PLANTS AND SUCH OTHER HOME ENERGY CONSERVATION EXPENSES AS SHALL
   10  BE DEEMED ALLOWABLE PURSUANT TO THE PROVISIONS OF SUCH LOCAL LAW.
   11    S  2. This act shall take effect on the first of January next succeed-
   12  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06406-01-1
